index.html:
List of Components

The Rich Text Editor is WYSIWYG ("what you see is what you get") editor useful to create and edit content. Also, return the valid HTML markup or markdown of the content

Key features:

  • Provides <IFRAME> and <DIV> modes

  • Capable of handling markdown editing.

  • Contains a modular library to load the necessary functionality on demand.

  • Provides a fully customizable toolbar.
